item.title: 印尼加入金砖国家，助推全球南方在世界舞台上的发展
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普的贸易政策给世界经济带来风险之际，印尼成为金砖国家集团的最新成员，此举将进一步支持全球南方国家。【原文：Indonesia has become the newest member of the BRICS group of developing nations, in a move that could further bolster the Global South as Donald Trump’s trade policies pose risks to world economy.】

item.title: 匈牙利开始 2025 年欧洲债券发行活动，未受疲软福林影响
item.description: 匈牙利坚持在年初获得国际融资的做法，并没有因为福林跌至两年来的低点而气馁。【原文：Hungary is sticking with its practice of securing international financing early in the year, undeterred by the forint’s slide toward two-year lows.】

item.title: 英国住宅建设连续第三个月下降，斯塔默遭遇挫折
item.description: 由于高利率和脆弱的消费者信心有可能阻碍工党政府促进建筑业发展的承诺，英国房屋建设以六个月来最快的速度下降。【原文：UK housebuilding dropped at the fastest pace in six months, as high interest rates and fragile consumer confidence threatened to hamper the Labour government’s pledge to boost construction.】

item.title: 交易员看淡欧元反弹，最快本月实现平价交易
item.description: 在美国准备迎接上一任总统复出之际，货币市场也在准备迎接一个罕见的事件：美元与欧元平价。【原文：As America gets ready for the return to office of a prior president, the currency market is preparing for a rare event of its own: Parity between the dollar and the euro.】

item.title: 英国 30 年期债券收益率攀升至 1998 年以来最高点
item.description: 由于交易商为出售债务腾出了空间，英国的长期借款成本升至 1998 年以来的最高水平。【原文：The UK’s long-term borrowing costs rose to the highest level since 1998 as traders made room for a sale of debt.】

item.title: 尼日利亚顶级银行零售股权发售融资 1.36 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚担保信托控股公司（Guaranty Trust Holding Co.【原文：Nigeria’s Guaranty Trust Holding Co. raised 209 billion naira ($136 million) selling shares locally, completing the first phase of a recapitalization plan to meet new industry rules.】

item.title: 欧洲最大股票牛市称 2025 年该地区可击败美国
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）的策略师表示，欧洲股市在去年严重落后于美国股市之后，在经济前景不断改善、企业盈利门槛较低的情况下，2025 年的前景将更加光明。【原文：European equities face a much brighter outlook in 2025 amid improving economic prospects and a low bar for corporate earnings after badly lagging US stocks last year, according to strategists at Deutsche Bank AG.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 11 月消费者通胀预期上升
item.description: 欧洲中央银行称，11 月份欧元区消费者的通胀预期有所上升。【原文：Inflation expectations of consumers in the euro area increased in November, the European Central Bank said.】

item.title: 英国杂货通胀上升，因为购物者在圣诞节大肆挥霍
item.description: 由于圣诞节期间的家庭支出创下历史新高，英国 12 月份的杂货价格通胀率有所上升。【原文：UK grocery price inflation rose in December as household spending over Christmas hit a record.】

item.title: 微软纳德拉承诺向印度投资 30 亿美元人工智能技术
item.description: 微软公司计划斥资 30 亿美元在印度扩展其云计算和人工智能能力，目标是在这个世界上人口最多的国家促进其收入增长。【原文：Microsoft Corp. plans to spend $3 billion to expand its cloud computing and artificial intelligence capabilities in India, targeting the world’s most populous country to fuel its revenue growth.】

item.title: 比利时以 10 年期债券掀起欧债销售热潮
item.description: 比利时将通过银行出售 2035 年 6 月到期的债券，预计这将是欧洲债务销售繁忙月份的开始。【原文：Belgium is selling a bond maturing in June 2035 through banks, in what is expected to be the start of a busy month for debt sales in Europe.】

item.title: 科技股涨势消退，欧洲股市下挫，焦点转向 CPI 数据
item.description: 周二，欧洲股市在创下一个多月来的最大单日涨幅后下跌，原因是科技股引领的反弹势头消退，投资者期待欧元区的通胀数据。【原文：European stocks dipped on Tuesday after their biggest daily gain in over a month as a tech-led rally fizzled out and investors looked ahead to the euro zone inflation data.】

item.title: 黄金价格接近历史最高水平，中国央行买入更多黄金
item.description: 中国央行在 12 月份连续第二个月扩大了黄金储备，这表明中国在去年因黄金价格飙升而暂时停止购买黄金之后，又重新燃起了购买欲望。【原文：China’s central bank expanded its gold reserves for a second month in December, signaling renewed appetite after temporarily pausing purchases last year as prices soared.】

item.title: 肯尼亚第三季度经济增长放缓至近四年低点
item.description: 在反政府抗议活动之后，所有关键行业的产出都有所下降，肯尼亚第三季度的经济增长速度放缓，创下了近四年来的最低水平。【原文：The pace of Kenya’s economic growth decelerated in the third quarter to the slowest in almost four years after all key industries recorded less output following anti-government protests.】

item.title: 越南央行称货币政策依然适当
item.description: 越南央行副行长杜明图（Dao Minh Tu）在本币跌至历史新低后几天表示，越南的货币政策立场仍然适当。【原文：Vietnam’s monetary policy stance remains appropriate, central bank Deputy Governor Dao Minh Tu said days after the local currency fell to a record low.】

item.title: 法国通胀小幅回升支持欧洲央行谨慎降息
item.description: 法国 12 月通胀加速，支持了欧洲中央银行只逐步降低利率的计划。【原文：French inflation accelerated in December, supporting the European Central Bank’s plan to only lower interest rates gradually.】

item.title: 泰国当局称找到疑似被诱骗到缅甸诈骗中心的中国演员
item.description: 泰国当局表示，一名在泰国与缅甸边境附近失踪的中国演员已被找到，他们正努力控制这一事件对泰国重要旅游业造成的影响。【原文：A Chinese actor who went missing near Thailand’s border with Myanmar has been found, Thai authorities said, as they sought to contain the fallout of the incident on the nation’s vital tourism industry.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀放缓，央行有望进一步放宽政策
item.description: 瑞士 12 月份通胀放缓，为进一步放宽利率提供了支持。【原文：Swiss inflation slowed in December, supporting the case for more easing in interest rates.】

item.title: 新加坡与澳大利亚合作研究社交媒体年龄限制
item.description: 新加坡一位官员周二表示，新加坡政府对制定社交媒体使用最低年龄法持开放态度，并正在与澳大利亚政府就此事进行谈判。【原文：Singapore’s government is open to instituting minimum-age laws for social media use and is in talks with counterparts in Australia over the matter, an official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯 Almoosa 公司首次公开募股耗资 4.5 亿美元，首次亮相即大涨
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯 Almoosa Health Co. 公司在利雅得首次公开募股 4.5 亿美元后，首次上市交易即大涨，一反近期中东上市令人失望的趋势。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Almoosa Health Co. surged in its trading debut following a $450 million initial public offering in Riyadh, bucking the recent trend of disappointing listings in the Middle East.】

item.title: 哈利法克斯称英国房价九个月来首次下跌
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，尽管英国房地产市场迎来了自大流行病以来最好的一年，但英国房价仍出现了九个月来的首次下滑。【原文：UK house prices slipped back for the first time in nine months even as the property market enjoyed its best year since the pandemic, according to one of the country’s largest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 日本汽车制造商誓言加强合作以夺回被中国夺走的市场份额
item.description: 日本最大的两家汽车品牌开始谈判一项协议，该协议将有效地把日本汽车业一分为二，就在此时，日本最大的汽车制造商承诺在以技术为重点的领域开展合作，以便在快速发展的全球行业中生存下来。【原文：Japan’s biggest automakers pledged cooperation in tech-focused areas to survive in the rapidly evolving global industry, just as two of its largest car brands begin negotiating a deal that would effectively split the country’s industry in two.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将下滑，英镑走强
瑞士宝盛以 1.01 亿美元将巴西业务出售给 BTG Pactual
item.description: 瑞士宝盛集团（Julius Baer Group Ltd.）表示，将以 6.15 亿雷亚尔（1.01 亿美元）的价格将巴西国内业务出售给拉丁美洲最大的独立投资银行 Banco BTG Pactual SA。【原文：Julius Baer Group Ltd. said it would sell its domestic Brazilian business to Banco BTG Pactual SA, the biggest independent investment bank in Latin America, for 615 million reais ($101 million).】

item.title: 据说 KazMunayGas 是卢克石油保加利亚炼油厂的竞标者之一
item.description: 据两位熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，哈萨克斯坦的 KazMunayGas National Company JSC 正在竞购俄罗斯卢克石油股份公司在保加利亚的炼油厂。【原文：Kazakhstan’s KazMunayGas National Company JSC is bidding to purchase the Bulgaria-based refinery of Russia’s Lukoil PJSC, according to two people familiar with the negotiations.】

item.title: 2025 年航运费因关税和罢工担忧而飙升
item.description: 过去一个月来，从亚洲向美国运送货物的集装箱现货运价飙升，原因是在一场罢工威胁到负责美国约一半海运贸易量的港口关闭之前，各家公司都在寻求避免更高的关税并增加库存。【原文：Spot container rates for shipping goods to the US from Asia have spiked over the past month as companies look to avoid higher tariffs and pad their inventories ahead of a strike threatening to close ports responsible for roughly half of the nation’s seaborne trade volumes.】

item.title: 中国为形成无地方障碍的统一市场而采取的详细步骤
item.description: 随着中国政府希望扩大内需，中国正在向地方官员施压，要求他们兑现建立全国统一市场的计划，并发布了改善竞争和消除准入障碍的指导方针。【原文：China is pressing local officials to deliver on plans to build a unified national market, issuing guidelines for improving competition and dismantling barriers to access as Beijing looks to expand domestic demand.】

item.title: 人民币空头受到香港融资成本飙升的挤压
item.description: 香港的人民币融资成本飙升至多年来从未见过的水平，表明人们担心中国政府稳定货币的努力可能会导致离岸市场流动性收紧。【原文：Yuan funding costs in Hong Kong surged to levels unseen in years, signaling concern that Beijing’s efforts to stabilize the currency may lead to tighter liquidity in the offshore market.】

item.title: 亚洲镍业希望向住友出售加工厂股权
item.description: 亚洲镍业公司（Nickel Asia Corp.）正在商谈将其在一家关键加工厂的少数股权出售给日本住友金属矿业公司（Sumitomo Metal Mining Co.【原文：Nickel Asia Corp. is in talks to unload its minority stake in a key processing plant to Japan’s Sumitomo Metal Mining Co. as the Philippines’ top producer of the metal focuses on upstream mining and renewable energy businesses.】

item.title: 货币期权交易因政治动荡而暴涨
item.description: 周一，3000 多亿美元的货币期权市场平静开始，直到政治头条新闻引发了近两个月来最紧张的交易日；这也是 2025 年可能出现的情况的一个缩影。【原文：Monday started quietly in the $300 billion-plus currency options market until political headlines triggered the most hectic trading day in nearly two months — a taste of what may lie in store for 2025.】
